title: Search Hit Evolution API
Description: It provides the time evolution of the number of searches per look date and per travel for a certain O&D .

inputs.name: market
inputs.description: 2-letter IATA country code of the point of sale

inputs.name: origin
inputs.description: 3-letter IATA code of the departure city (optional)

inputs.name: destination
inputs.description: 3-letter IATA code of the arrival city (optional)

outputs.name: look_date
outputs.description: time series of number of hits by look date

outputs.name: travel_date
outputs.description: time series of number of hits by travel date

outputs.name: look_weekday
outputs.description: distribution of hits by day of week of look date

outputs.name: travel_weekday
outputs.description: distribution of hits by day of week of travel date
